response.original_title: Shpongledroid: Live at the Fillmore Auditorium, Denver, CO
response.overview: SHPONGLEDROID  October 28, 2023  A one-of-a-kind celebration of music, art, and performance featuring original music and visuals by Shpongle with Android Jones. This event marked a unique Birthday & Barn Build Back Celebration, with a live Shpongle PA set by Simon Posford.  Performers & Features:  Lunar Fire Dance Theater led by Laureleye Maqi Ananda  Belly dance fusion choreography by Darshan Dance Company (Katie Bhairavi Marshall)  Aerial acts by Denver Circus Collective and Fractal Circus  Props, costumes, and masks by Artmyths  Production:  Live streaming by Top Level Productions  Directed by Nick Bogannam  Audio mastering by Stooodio Mastering  Special thanks to everyone who contributed to weaving the mystical world of Shpongle. Stay Shpongled!
response.title: Shpongledroid: Live at the Fillmore Auditorium, Denver, CO
